content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we're discussing the rental price. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I believe that a fair price for the newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center would be around 700 Euro per month. This is a reasonable amount considering the location and amenities nearby.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm not satisfied with that offer. I'm looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're seeking a higher price. Let's find a middle ground. How about 750 Euro per month? This should be a fair compromise considering the apartment's features and the market value.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm still not satisfied with the offer. I believe the apartment is worth more than that. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. How about 800 Euro per month? This would reflect the premium for the central location and the new construction.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's still not high enough for me. I believe the apartment deserves a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, let's try 850 Euro per month. This is a competitive price for the area, given the proximity to amenities and the quality of the construction.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's a better offer, but I believe the apartment is worth even more. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Certainly, Mister Schmidt. How about 900 Euro per month? This would be a premium price for a premium location. Your investment in this property will be well-rewarded.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I believe the apartment is worth even more than that. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
